org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow

Interface IReadFilterInternalListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReadService

    public interface IReadFilterInternalListener
    The Interface provides notification of statistics (hardware view) updates to ReaderFilter listeners within the protocol plugin

    • Method Summary

      Methods
